text: Yisakale suta khaya, sihamte se'i byaktira darae (kabarara paraa) uthiba, yaka cayatane sparsa karai baliya banaya. E'ito e'i babe ye, sihamte kaya, byarasaya-banijya sutara darae'i. Athaca allahe byarasaya.-Banijyaka halala karaiche arau sutaka haraama karaiche. Eteke yara ocarata te'omra pratipalakara paraa upadesa ahara pichata birata haâ€™la, tente atitata yi haiche seya tara babe'i icchadhina; arau tara hicapa nikaca allahara ocarata; arau yisakale aman'ya karai ubhati yaba sihamte'i jahannamara adhibasi, tata sihamta cirasthayi haâ€™ba
